titleStmt.title: The excellency of a publick spirit set forth in a sermon preach'd (since much enlarged) at the funeral of that late reverend divine Dr. Samuel Annesley, who departed this life Dec. 31, 1696 in the 77th year of his age : with a brief account of his life and death / by Daniel Williams.
titleStmt.author: Williams, Daniel, 1643?-1716.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
